p: The motility assay of untreated and treated C. jejuni revealed that PEO can inhibit the spread of the bacteria. After 24 h microaerobic incubation, untreated cells had a 32.67 ± 3.21 mm turbid area ( Figure 3), decreasing markedly in the C. jejuni cells treated with 50 μg mL −1 PEO (13.33 ± 4.04 mm; Figure 3). No swarming was observed if cells were inoculated into the soft agar medium containing 150 μg mL −1 PEO ( Figure 3). Motility assays were performed 3 times and the average diameters are presented ( Figure 3).
